verses.verse: <S%H6965>"Arise,<s%> <S%H215>shine;<s%> for your <S%H216>light<s%> has <S%H935>come,<s%> And the <S%H9202>glory<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H2224>risen<s%> upon you.

"For <S%H2009>behold,<s%> <S%H2822>darkness<s%> will <S%H3680>cover<s%> the <S%H776>earth,<s%> And <S%H6205>deep<s%> <S%H6205>darkness<s%> the <S%H3816>peoples;<s%> But the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will <S%H2224>rise<s%> upon you, And His <S%H9202>glory<s%> will <S%H7200>appear<s%> upon you.
"And <S%H1471>nations<s%> will <S%H1980>come<s%> to your <S%H216>light,<s%> And <S%H4428>kings<s%> to the <S%H5051>brightness<s%> of your <S%H2225>rising.<s%>

<S%H5375>"Lift<s%> up your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H5439>round<s%> <S%H5439>about,<s%> and <S%H7200>see;<s%> They <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H6908>gather<s%> together, they <S%H935>come<s%> to you. Your <S%H1121>sons<s%> will <S%H935>come<s%> from <S%H7350>afar,<s%> And your <S%H1323>daughters<s%> will be <S%H539>carried<s%> in the <S%H6654>arms.<s%>

<S%H227>"Then<s%> you will <S%H7200>see<s%> and be <S%H9315>radiant,<s%> And your <S%H3824>heart<s%> will <S%H6342>thrill<s%> and <S%H7337>rejoice;<s%> <S%H3588>Because<s%> the <S%H1995>abundance<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%> will be <S%H2015>turned<s%> to you, The <S%H2428>wealth<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations<s%> will <S%H935>come<s%> to you.

"A <S%H8229>multitude<s%> of <S%H1581>camels<s%> will <S%H3680>cover<s%> you, The <S%H1072>young<s%> <S%H1072>camels<s%> of <S%H4080>Midian<s%> and <S%H5891>Ephah;<s%> <S%H3605>All<s%> those from <S%H7614>Sheba<s%> will <S%H935>come;<s%> They will <S%H5375>bring<s%> <S%H2091>gold<s%> and <S%H3828>frankincense,<s%> And will <S%H1319>bear<s%> good <S%H1319>news<s%> of the <S%H8416>praises<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

<S%H3605>"All<s%> the <S%H6629>flocks<s%> of <S%H6938>Kedar<s%> will be <S%H6908>gathered<s%> together to you, The <S%H352>rams<s%> of <S%H5032>Nebaioth<s%> will <S%H8334>minister<s%> to you; They will <S%H5927>go<s%> up with <S%H7522>acceptance<s%> on My <S%H4196>altar,<s%> And I shall <S%H6286>glorify<s%> My <S%H8597>glorious<s%> <S%H1004>house.<s%>
<S%H4310>"Who<s%> are <S%H428>these<s%> who <S%H5774>fly<s%> like a <S%H5645>cloud,<s%> And like the <S%H3123>doves<s%> to their <S%H699>lattices<s%>?

<S%H3588>"Surely<s%> the <S%H339>coastlands<s%> will <S%H6960>wait<s%> for Me; And the <S%H591>ships<s%> of <S%H8659>Tarshish<s%> [will come] <S%H7223>first,<s%> To <S%H935>bring<s%> your <S%H1121>sons<s%> from <S%H7350>afar,<s%> Their <S%H3701>silver<s%> and their <S%H2091>gold<s%> with them, For the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> And for the <S%H6918>Holy<s%> <S%H6918>One<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> He has <S%H6286>glorified<s%> you.

"And <S%H1121>foreigners<s%> <S%H5236><s%> will <S%H1129>build<s%> up your <S%H2346>walls,<s%> And their <S%H4428>kings<s%> will <S%H8334>minister<s%> to you; For in My <S%H7110>wrath<s%> I <S%H5221>struck<s%> you, And in My <S%H7522>favor<s%> I have <S%H7355>had<s%> <S%H7355>compassion<s%> on you.

"And your <S%H8179>gates<s%> will be <S%H6605>open<s%> <S%H8548>continually;<s%> They will not be <S%H5462>closed<s%> <S%H3119>day<s%> or <S%H3915>night,<s%> So that [men] may <S%H935>bring<s%> to you the <S%H2428>wealth<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> With their <S%H4428>kings<s%> <S%H5090>led<s%> in <S%H5090>procession.<s%>
"For the <S%H1471>nation<s%> and the <S%H4467>kingdom<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> will not <S%H5647>serve<s%> you will perish, And the <S%H6>nations<s%> will be <S%H1471>utterly<s%> <S%H2717>ruined.<s%>

"The <S%H9202>glory<s%> of <S%H3844>Lebanon<s%> will <S%H935>come<s%> to you, The <S%H1265>juniper,<s%> the <S%H8410>box<s%> <S%H8410>tree,<s%> and the <S%H8391>cypress<s%> <S%H9191>together,<s%> To <S%H6286>beautify<s%> the <S%H4725>place<s%> of My <S%H4720>sanctuary;<s%> And I shall <S%H3513>make<s%> the <S%H4725>place<s%> of My <S%H7272>feet<s%> <S%H3513>glorious.<s%>

"And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of those who <S%H6031>afflicted<s%> you will <S%H1980>come<s%> <S%H7817>bowing<s%> to you, And <S%H3605>all<s%> those who <S%H5006>despised<s%> you will <S%H7812>bow<s%> themselves at the <S%H3709>soles<s%> of your <S%H7272>feet;<s%> And they will <S%H7121>call<s%> you the <S%H5892>city<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> The <S%H6726>Zion<s%> of the <S%H6918>Holy<s%> <S%H6918>One<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

<S%H8478>"Whereas<s%> you have <S%H1961>been<s%> <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> and <S%H8130>hated<s%> With <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H369>one<s%> <S%H5674>passing<s%> <S%H5674>through,<s%> I will <S%H7760>make<s%> you an <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H1347>pride,<s%> A <S%H4885>joy<s%> from <S%H1755>generation<s%> to <S%H1755>generation.<s%>

"You will also <S%H3243>suck<s%> the <S%H2461>milk<s%> of <S%H1471>nations,<s%> And will <S%H3243>suck<s%> the <S%H9582>breast<s%> of <S%H4428>kings;<s%> Then you will <S%H3045>know<s%> that I, the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> am your <S%H3467>Savior,<s%> And your <S%H1350>Redeemer,<s%> the <S%H46>Mighty<s%> <S%H46>One<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob.<s%>

<S%H8478>"Instead<s%> of <S%H5178>bronze<s%> I will <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H2091>gold,<s%> And <S%H8478>instead<s%> of <S%H1270>iron<s%> I will <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H3701>silver,<s%> And <S%H8478>instead<s%> of <S%H6086>wood,<s%> <S%H5178>bronze,<s%> And <S%H8478>instead<s%> of <S%H68>stones,<s%> <S%H1270>iron.<s%> And I will <S%H7760>make<s%> <S%H7965>peace<s%> your <S%H6486>administrators,<s%> And <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> your <S%H5065>overseers.<s%>

<S%H2555>"Violence<s%> will not be <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H5750>again<s%> in your <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H3808>Nor<s%> <S%H7701>devastation<s%> or <S%H7667>destruction<s%> within your <S%H1366>borders;<s%> But you will <S%H7121>call<s%> your <S%H2346>walls<s%> <S%H3444>salvation,<s%> and your <S%H8179>gates<s%> <S%H8416>praise.<s%>

<S%H3808>"No<s%> <S%H5750>longer<s%> will you <S%H1961>have<s%> the <S%H8121>sun<s%> for <S%H216>light<s%> by <S%H3119>day,<s%> <S%H3808>Nor<s%> for <S%H5051>brightness<s%> will the <S%H3394>moon<s%> <S%H215>give<s%> you <S%H215>light;<s%> But you will <S%H1961>have<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> for an <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H216>light,<s%> And your <S%H430>God<s%> for your <S%H8597>glory.<s%>

"Your <S%H8121>sun<s%> will <S%H935>set<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more,<s%> <S%H3808>Neither<s%> will your <S%H3394>moon<s%> <S%H622>wane;<s%> For you will <S%H1961>have<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> for an <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H216>light,<s%> And the <S%H3117>days<s%> of your <S%H60>mourning<s%> will be <S%H9608>finished.<s%>

"Then <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H5971>people<s%> [will be] <S%H6662>righteous;<s%> They will <S%H3423>possess<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H5769>forever,<s%> The <S%H5342>branch<s%> of My <S%H4302>planting,<s%> The <S%H4639>work<s%> of My <S%H3027>hands,<s%> That I may be <S%H6286>glorified.<s%>

"The <S%H9512>smallest<s%> <S%H9512>one<s%> will <S%H1961>become<s%> a <S%H505>clan,<s%> And the <S%H6810>least<s%> <S%H6810>one<s%> a <S%H6099>mighty<s%> <S%H1471>nation.<s%> I, the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> will <S%H2363>hasten<s%> it in its <S%H6256>time.<s%>"
